WorkItem.Description: New feature to be able to import DDL from a SQL script from the supported databases
WorkItem.Summary: Reverse engineering by import SQL script

Comments.Message:
I personally would love to be able to "Load SQL (MySQL innoDB)" or heck even better be able to give it a odbc:// connect and have the program load the DDL so I can check / validate my Foreign Key mappings visually.

Thanks,
Jeff M.
This would be really good eather connect and download a live copy of all tables or just accept an SQL script
